M. Andrychowicz
A. Ray

dcterms:description: A continuous N-dimensional torus environment where robots take steps to reach a location and can also perform a 'freeze' action that teleports them to a random location, demonstrating the bias of Hindsight Experience Replay.
dcterms:title: 4-Torus with Freeze

dcterms:creator: S. M. Lavalle
dcterms:description: An environment where a robot must navigate around walls while subject to Gaussian action noise, demonstrating the challenges of reinforcement learning in noisy conditions.
dcterms:title: Car with Random Noise

dcterms:creator: S. M. Lavalle
dcterms:description: An environment where a robot must learn to safely navigate a traffic light to reach its goal, illustrating the complexities of decision-making in dynamic environments.
dcterms:title: Red Light

dcterms:creator: S. M. Lavalle
dcterms:description: An environment where a robot arm manipulates objects to reach a point, push an object, and slide an object to a point outside of its reach, demonstrating robotic manipulation tasks.
dcterms:title: Fetch

dcterms:creator: M. Plappert
M. Andrychowicz
A. Ray
B. McGrew
B. Baker
G. Powell
J. Schneider
J. Tobin
M. Chociej
P. Welinder
V. Kumar
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A simulated robot arm on a mobile base tasked with throwing a ball to a randomly selected location, with a chance of wind affecting the trajectory.
dcterms:title: Mobile Throwing Robot

dcterms:creator: S. M. Lavalle
dcterms:description: An environment where a mechanum robot navigates around obstacles to reach a goal, demonstrating real-world robotic navigation challenges.
dcterms:title: Navigation on a physical mechanum robot
